thread.section_title: Travelup Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.travelup.co.uk | 51 of 1272
thread.title: Connor Aiden Jordan
thread.title_full: Travelup reviewed by Connor Aiden Jordan

author: Connor Aiden Jordan
title: Connor Aiden Jordan
text:
I would tend to ignore the negative reviews of Travelup - as with any agent offering tickets at this value, their system is bound to have times where it offers tickets that no longer exist, or which prices have changed.
I booked my tickets for a multi-city trip with Travelup after being referred via SkyScanner. The website is clean, modern, and easy to use. I was a little skeptical at first after reading other reviews and due to the price, and reading horror stories of people never receiving their e-tickets. I can safely say that the booking process was simple and I received my tickets within minutes of confirming my booking. I then validated the tickets through the individual airlines and they were all immediately viewable and correct.
All-in-all, considering the value and the fact that the website is nicely designed and easy to use, I would recommend. I don't think the tickets you are looking for not being available anymore warrants a negative review, so I would ignore those.
